definition: falling short of some prescribed norm, a character or symbol set or printed or written beneath or slightly below and to the side of another character
details:
adjective
- falling short of some prescribed norm
= synonyms: deficient
- of or characteristic of low rank or importance
- of low or inferior quality
- having an orbit between the sun and the Earth's orbit
= example: having an orbit between the sun and the Earth's orbit
- written or printed below and to one side of another character
= synonyms: subscript
- lower than a given reference point
= example: lower than a given reference point
noun
- a character or symbol set or printed or written beneath or slightly below and to the side of another character
= synonyms: subscript
- one of lesser rank or station or quality
